Apa Harapan Firman Utina Terhadap Ketua Umum Baru PSSI?
05 Nov 2019, 16:04 by Bola.net
Bola.net - PSSI saat ini punya ketua umum yang baru. Mochammad Iriawan baru saja terpilih sebagai ketua dengan didampingi dua wakilnya, Cucu Sumantri dan Iwan Budianto, hingga 2023 nanti.
Namun, siapapun yang menjadi pengurus PSSI, tentu banyak harapan besar dari berbagai kalangan pencinta sepak bola, terutama diarahkan kepada sosok Iwan Bule, sapaan akrab Mochammad Iriawan, sebagai ketua umum.
Seperti halnya eks pemain Timnas Indonesia, Firman Utina. Firman bangga dengan muka baru di kepengurusan PSSI seperti Iwan Bule dan Cucu Sumantri.
"Mudah-mudahan ada inspirasi baru dan PSSI lebih bagus lagi. Saya harap PSSI di bawah kendali Pak Iwan bisa lebih melihat Liga-nya tersendiri, lebih melihat apa saja hak pemain dan pelatih karena kami stakeholder yang sama, ujar Firman di Bandung, Senin (4/11/2019).
Eks pemain Persib Bandung ini optimistis Iwan Bule bisa menyelesaikan segala permasalahan di sepak bola yang terjadi selama ini, satu di antaranya dugaan adanya match fixing.
"Selama bermain di Liga, saya tidak pernah ketemu soal match fixing. Tapi, dengan adanya Satgas Antimafia Bola, kami sangat mendukung. Ini hal yang baik sehingga tidak ada sepak bola yang di-remote dari atas," ujar Firman.
"Jadikan sepak bola itu magic yang membuat setiap orang selalu datang. Magic bukan hal yang lain ya, tapi sepak bola karena skill-nya, karena strategi, dan kelebihan pemain serta pelatihnya," tambah Firman yang pernah membawa Persib juara ISL 2014 ini.

What is the Word of Utina's Hope for the New Chair of PSSI?
05 Nov 2019, 16:04 by Bola.net
Bola.net - PSSI currently has a new chairman. Mochammad Iriawan has just been elected as chairman accompanied by two representatives, Cucu Sumantri and Iwan Budianto, until 2023.
However, whoever becomes the organizer of PSSI, there are certainly many great hopes from various circles of soccer lovers, especially directed to the figure of Iwan Bule, Mochammad Iriawan's familiar greeting, as general chairman.
Like the former Indonesian national team player, Firman Utina. Firman is proud of the new faces in the management of PSSI such as Iwan Bule and Cucu Sumantri.
"Hopefully there will be new inspiration and PSSI will be better. I hope that PSSI under the control of Mr. Iwan can see his League more, see more the rights of players and coaches because we are the same stakeholders, said Firman in Bandung on Monday ( 11/4/2019).
The former Persib Bandung player is optimistic that Iwan Bule can solve all the problems in football that have happened so far, one of which is the alleged existence of match fixing.
"During playing in the league, I never met the match fixing problem. But, with the Antimafia Football Task Force, we are very supportive. This is a good thing so that there is no football remote from above," said Firman.
"Make soccer a magic that makes everyone always come. Magic is not something else, but football because of its skills, because of strategy, and the strengths of players and coaches," added Firman, who had brought Persib ISL 2014 champion.
